item.title: Codeigniter HMVC and Your own Layout Library
item.description: I’m trying to make a partial output from hmvc module, $this->obj =& get_instance(); and then I’m trying to load a view from some module, $this->obj->load->view($view,$data); This will resulting errors, it turns out $this->obj is only loading the global view of CI i.e. ./application/views/ HMVC is not overriding the default view of CI, you might have to pass your controller object $this from your controller to your layout library,
